name: piklor.js
description: A tiny JavaScript color picker library.

scripts.update-min: cp src/piklor.min.js example/js/piklor.js && git add example && git commit -m 'Updated piklor.js in the example dir' .
scripts.deploy: cp -r example ../_tmp && git checkout gh-pages && cp -r ../_tmp/* . && git add . -A && git commit -m 'Rebuild.' && rm -rf ../_tmp ../_tmp.js

author: jillix <contact@jillix.com>
